pageProduct.name: Rosken Biomexa Probiotic Moisturiser 400ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Enriched with a special blend of Probiotics and Colloidal Oatmeal, Biomexa™ is an intensive moisturiser that provides a barrier to help soothe and protect very dry and itchy skin. 400 mL.

Biomexa™ is dermatologically tested, and clinically proven to nourish and protect dry skin by doubling skin moisture levels in 2 hours. This unique formula is enriched with a special blend of Probiotics derived from Yogurt Extract, as well as 20mg/g of Colloidal Oatmeal to soothe very dry skin.

Probiotics: Adds good bacteria to Improve skin barrier for defence against flare ups caused by bad bacteria.

Colloidal Oatmeal: A moisture-binding, soothing agent that soothes skin dryness, redness and itchiness by forming a protective glove-like shield over the skin to help retain its natural moisture.

This creamy, fast-absorbing and non-greasy formula is pH balanced and soothes the skin by delivering intensive, lasting hydration for smoother and softer skin.

Size: 400mL

Warnings

For external use only. Avoid eyes. Do not use on broken skin. Store below 30°C.

Ingredients

Water, Glycerine, Hydrogenated Olive Oil, Cetearyl Alcohol, Ceteareth-20, Dimethicone, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Extract, Mineral Oil, Yogurt Extract (Probiotic), EDTA, Buylated Hydroxyanisole, Tetrasodium EDTA, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol.

Directions

Apply to dry areas as often as required, particularly after bathing with warm water.
For external use only. Avoid eyes. Do not use on broken skin. Store below 30°C.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 30°C.
